### <font face="Arial Black"> Data</font>

One of the main contributions of the BMBF project is based on the delivery of data for the national and regional policies linked to the mining sector. The team of researchers has compiled more than 300 macro/microeconomic variables related to the national accounts, activity variables, demographic variables, labor variables, input-output matrices, among others.
